alert.note: Alert for Clare; Isabella; Mecosta; Osceola (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 3:33PM EDT until August 29 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Isabella County in central Michigan... Clare County in central Michigan... Eastern Osceola County in central Michigan... Eastern Mecosta County in central Michigan... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 332 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles north of Mecosta, or 10 miles east of Big Rapids, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mount Pleasant... Clare... Shepherd... Marion... Farwell... Mecosta... Rosebush... Canadian Lakes... Lake Isabella... Harrison... Remus... Millbrook... Lake... Barryton... Brinton... Sylvester... Lake George... Avondale... Delwin... Winn... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
